uno.player

Class ComputerPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • uno.player.Player
      • uno.player.ComputerPlayer

  • public class ComputerPlayer
extends Player
    Determines a semi-intelligent computer player that can choose its next card based on some simple heuristics.

    • Method Detail

      • printCards

        public void printCards()
        Print of computer player does nothing to keep cards of its hand secret!
        Specified by:
        printCards in class Player

      • chooseCard

        public Card chooseCard(UnoGame unoGame)
        Chooses next card based on following heuristics:
        From cards that can be chosen based on ground card and color,
        1. first choose a numeric card randomly,
        2. otherwise choose an action card randomly,
        3. otherwise choose a wild card randomly,
        4. otherwise ask for store
        Specified by:
        chooseCard in class Player
        Parameters:
        unoGame - game object
        Returns:
        chosen card

      • simpleChooseCard

        private Card simpleChooseCard(java.util.List<Card> cards)
        Chooses next card based on following heuristics:
        From cards that can be chosen based on ground card and color,
        1. first choose a numeric card randomly,
        2. otherwise choose an action card randomly,
        3. otherwise choose a wild card randomly,
        4. otherwise ask for store
        Parameters:
        cards - cards of the player
        Returns:
        chosen card

      • getColorString

        protected java.lang.String getColorString(UnoGame unoGame)
        Chooses a color from player's cards colors based on following rules:
        1. choose majority color of cards.
        2. if there's equal counts, choose color with most numeric cards,
        3. choose randomly from equal count and numeric colors.
        Specified by:
        getColorString in class Player
        Parameters:
        unoGame - game object
        Returns:
        chosen color

      • simpleChooseColor

        private java.lang.String simpleChooseColor(java.util.List<Card> cards)
        Chooses a color from input cards colors based on following rules:
        1. choose majority color of cards.
        2. if there's equal counts, choose color with most numeric cards,
        3. choose randomly from equal count and numeric colors.
        Parameters:
        cards - cards to select color from
        Returns:
        chosen color
